name: School Thief (SC37Games)
description:
The aim of the game is to get as much money as possible. But how? Well, by stealing stuff, and then selling it to your classmates or bringing it back home. But stealing stuff isn't as easy as it sounds. Some items are more valuable than others, some take up more space in your bag... And of course, there's the whole 'not getting caught' thing.

~ 24 different students, each with their own personality!

~ Different students will react in different ways! Some are stronger, or faster, or less likely to suspect you than others!

~ Three clubs where you can get useful enhancements!

~ Character customization!

~ A cat! It doesn't really do anything, but it's there!

~ And many more secrets...
